about_the_game:
What is The Fabric of the Mind

The Fabric of the Mind is a rage-platformer with lots of death. The main-mechanic of sticking to walls turns the world on its head and promises interesting gameplay, fun bosses and an entire emptional story to be discovered. A psychological horror experience with a dark atmosphere in complete Black and White.

Fast-paced Gameplay


Platform your way through the Black and White halls of this world. Get a speedboost and fight against the current to get to the exit waiting right around the corner.

Get into Action


Pain, Pain, Pain. In this game you need to fight your pain to keep on going, make it to the end before you decide to shut it down. Death after death, just one more try.

Challenge your neurons


Puzzling dead ends and question marks floating over your head. Puzzles that give you a little break from the heated gameplay or make it even hotter!

A dark Story


So called "Memory Cores" are hidden everywhere within the game. Memory Cores contain information, images, emotions. Piece together a chronological timeline of events that help you understand the Pain and suffering of this world.

Is the game for me?

If you like more than 5 of the following aspects, then yes. You should at least check out the demo!
  • Fast-paced gameplay.
  • Monochrome Pixel-art (can you call this art?).
  • Easy to get into, but hard to master gameplay.
  • A dark and gloomy atmosphere.
  • Unique ideas for each of the biomes.
  • Variety in gameplay-mechanics.
  • A dark story to uncover.
  • The need to stay determined.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th generation or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You should be perfectly fine with any GPU

short_description: "The Fabric of the Mind" is a difficult, but rewarding game. The Game is structured into multiple acts that take the player through different creative ideas, sometimes painful gameplay and a lot of deaths. And all of that in complete Black and White.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
